name: Intro
title: Welcome to the game: Misthaven.
description: This is a choose your own adventure game\nHere are the rules...
options_text: Begin the ADVENTURE or call it QUITS

name: Adventure
title: The pursuit...
description: You're running down the street of Misthaven, away from the cops. They're in hot pursuit and want to take you back to the orphanage.
options_text: Do you want to run to and hide inside the TAVERN or jump into a moving horse driven CART?
